venue.address_2: Cross Streets: Between Industrial Dr and RI-116
venue.name: Box Seats

item.description:
Come and watch the Pats!

Box Seats is an interesting combination of sports bar, restaurant, and clam shack. A large menu with seafood, chowders, chili and soups offers something for everyone. The restaurant's menu also includes an entire section of Caesar salads, as well as a variety of burgers, sandwiches, and barbeque. Also features twenty different beers on tap!

A 1.00 donation is appreciated for this event to help cover Meetup web costs.
item.name: Pats vs. Oakland Raiders
